game.name: Lushfoil Photography Sim
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Tracked Controller Support, VR Supported, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 현실 같은 게임 내 카메라와 엄청난 시각적 충실도로 제공되는 사실적이고 세부적인 풍경을 방대하게 선택할 수 있는 고요한 탐험 및 사진 촬영 경험.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A tranquil exploration and photography experience set across a vast selection of faithfully detailed landscapes.

reviewHighlights.text: I bought the game hoping it would let me try realistic simulated lenses. The focal lengths feel fake. Instead of actual lens compression, the game see...
Having become physically disabled in recent years, I miss wondering around Nature freely with my camera....and this game has filled that void for me....
